Introduction

Ikling (아이클링) is a four-member project girl group under CodeM Entertainment, formed and produced by composer Son Dayeon. They debuted on April 28, 2023 with the release of their first digital single, "Stargram". On July 17, 2024, Ikling appeared with an entirely new lineup, consisting of Haeon, Yerin, Cindy, Seolhee. On August 23, 2024, they released their second digital single "Trip Go".
